items.message: This Flood Alert has been removed. The risk of flooding from the North Sea has now reduced. We continue to monitor the situation.

items.message: We are expecting high tides at Goole Docks tonight, Friday 24/2/23. The tide will be at its highest between 22:00 and 22:15. High tides are expected until Saturday 25/02/23. We are not expecting to issue any flood warnings but will continue to monitor levels closely. Please stay away from coastal footpaths and roads as large waves and sea spray could be dangerous. This message will be updated by 08:40, 25/02/23.

The Flood Alert for the coast of the Isle of Sheppey and the coast from Kemsley to Seasalter is no longer in force. The situation is improving and no further flooding is expected in this area.

The risk of flooding has now passed. The current series of high tides has now reached its peak, and will fall away over the next few days.
